scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:llrt
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:llrt
scripts.download:raw: git clone https://github.com/awslabs/llrt.git llrt-main && cd llrt-main && git submodule update --init --checkout && brew install zig make cmake zstd node corepack llvm@20 && make stdlib && make libs && rustup run nightly cargo build -r --target aarch64-apple-darwin && mv target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/llrt ../
